{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1138\cocoasubrtf470 {\fonttbl\f0\fswiss\fcharset0 Helvetica;\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Monaco;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920\tx8640\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 Run \f1 fish \f0 at the command line to start it up! Some useful commands:\ \ Interactively set your colors from a web page:\ \
\f1 fish_config \f0 \ \ Update man-page completions:\ \
\f1 fish_update_completions \f0 \ \ Make fish your default shell:\ \
\f1 chsh -s /usr/local/bin/fish\
\f0 \ \ Enjoy!\ }
